name: doctor_who
description: Doctor Who package: time travel, paradox, villainous choices, Doctors & Companions, Daleks & Cybermen, historic matters, tokens, vehicles, and suspend synergies.

Creature: Paradox — Whenever you cast a spell from outside your hand, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
When this creature enters the battlefield, time travel.
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, create a Treasure token.
Whenever you cast a historic spell, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
Whenever one or more artifact tokens enter the battlefield under your control, draw a card. This ability triggers only once each turn.
Instant: Counter target spell. Time travel.
Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If this spell was cast from exile, draw a card.
Target creature gets -{X}/-{X} until end of turn. If a creature died this turn, create a Treasure token.
Exile target card from a graveyard. Create a Clue token. Scry 1.
Choose one — Time travel; or each opponent faces a villainous choice — They discard a card; or they sacrifice a creature.
Sorcery: Create two 3/3 [TOKEN_COLOR] Dalek artifact creature tokens with menace.
Time travel, then draw two cards.
Each opponent faces a villainous choice — They sacrifice a nonland permanent; or they lose {X} life. You gain {X} life.
Paradox — If you cast this spell from your graveyard or exile, create two Treasure tokens.
Search your library for a historic card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Time travel, then create a Clue token.
Time travel twice. (Then do it again.)
Add a time counter to up to two target permanents you control. Then you may remove a time counter from a suspended card you own.
Enchantment: Paradox — Whenever you cast a spell from outside your hand, create a Clue token.
Whenever you sacrifice an artifact, each opponent faces a villainous choice — They lose 2 life; or you gain 2 life.
At the beginning of your end step, time travel.
Whenever a historic permanent enters the battlefield under your control, scry 1, then draw a card.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may create a 3/3 [TOKEN_COLOR] Dalek artifact creature token with menace.
Paradox — Whenever you cast a spell from outside your hand, scry 1.
Paradox — Whenever you cast a spell from outside your hand, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature.
Paradox — Whenever you cast a spell from your graveyard, create a tapped Treasure token.
Paradox — At the beginning of your end step, if you cast two or more spells from outside your hand this turn, draw a card.
Artifact: {ACTIVATED_COST} Time travel. Activate only as a sorcery.
{ACTIVATED_COST} Sacrifice this artifact: Create a Food token and a Clue token.
Historic spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
{ACTIVATED_COST} Target player faces a villainous choice — They sacrifice a creature; or you draw a card.
{ACTIVATED_COST} Tap: Add one mana of any color. When you spend this mana to cast a spell from exile, scry 1.
AuraCreature: Enchanted creature gets +{X}/+{X} and has menace.
Enchanted creature has "Whenever this creature attacks, each opponent faces a villainous choice — They lose 2 life; or you create a Treasure token."
Enchanted creature has "Paradox — Whenever you cast a spell from outside your hand, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature."
AuraLand: Enchanted land has "{T}: Add one mana of any color."
Enchanted land has "{T}: Add {C}{C}. Spend this mana only to cast historic spells."
Enchanted land has "{T}: Scry 1. If this is the second time you've scryed this turn, draw a card."
Equipment: Equipped creature has ward {X} and gets +1/+1.
Equipped creature has "{T}: Scry 1, then surveil 1."
Equipped creature has "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, time travel."
Equipped creature has "{ACTIVATED_COST} Choose one — Draw a card; or create a Treasure token."

Creature: Paradox — Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, {ACTIVATED_EFFECT}
Paradox — Whenever you cast a spell from exile or your graveyard, scry {X}.
Paradox — Whenever you cast your second spell this turn from outside your hand, create a Clue token.
Doctor's companion.
As long as you control a legendary creature named [{DOCTOR_TITLE}], historic spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Whenever a legendary creature enters the battlefield under your control, time travel.
Instant: Time travel. (For each permanent you control and each suspended card you own, you may add or remove a time counter from it.)
Choose up to one target permanent you control and/or one suspended card you own. Add or remove a time counter from it. Time travel.
For each of up to two target permanents you control with time counters on them, add or remove a time counter. Time travel.
